turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi. how may i assist you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Can I order a Grande Mocha Frappuccino?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where would you like to place this coffee order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I pick it up at 5106 Northern Boulevard?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you have any milk preferences for your drink.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And can you add whipped cream to it? Can you add whipped cream to it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, adding whipped cream to your order a.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That will be all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so you want a grande mocha frappucino with whipped cream at starbucks on 5106 nadden boulevard.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like me to place your order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your order has been placed. it will be ready shortly at the starbucks on nadden boulevard.
